features: These exquisite Chandbali Jhumka earrings feature a cascading design, inspired by traditional Mughal architecture and South Indian temple jewelry. The intricate detailing of the floral and paisley (manga design) motifs, studded with sparkling CZ stones, reflects exceptional craftsmanship. Modern Chandbali structure, light weight and easy to wear.
colors: Brilliant silver/white (rhodium plated finish) creates a stunning backdrop for the dazzling white CZ stones.

description: These Diamond Chandbali Jhumkas blend traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality CZ stones offer incredible sparkle and brilliance, comparable to genuine diamonds, at an accessible price point. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, they are a statement piece that commands attention without sacrificing comfort. The timeless design ensures they will remain a cherished piece in your jewelry collection for years to come.
